title: Memoirs of a Female Prisoner - Novel Updates
tags: Average-looking Protagonist   Awkward Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Prison   Slow Growth at Start   Weak to Strong
author: Kang Zhongren
description: Xue Bing, a girl from a poor rural family, was admitted to the university and became the “pride of the village”. She thought that she would leave the countryside and embark on a road to success. However, after entering the workplace with great hardship, she found that the gap between reality and her dreams were too great. She was a high-educated woman with a high degree of education. She works in a government office in a remote rural township. She was useless, and was often ridiculed by people around her as a foolish woman that only understands ancient books…>
